<h3 id="X12675">X(12675)&nbsp;=&nbsp;ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: INCIRCLE-CIRCLES TO EXTOUCH</h3>
Trilinears &nbsp;&nbsp; (b+c)*a^5-(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a^4-2*(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+2*(b^2+c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b+c)*a-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(12675) = 3*X(1)-X(12672) = X(4)-3*X(354) = 2*X(5)-3*X(3742) = X(20)+3*X(3873) = X(40)-3*X(10167) = X(72)-3*X(3576) = 4*X(140)-3*X(3740) = 3*X(210)-5*X(631) = 3*X(354)+X(12680) = X(3555)+3*X(10167)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(72).</p>
<p>X(12675) lies on these lines: {1,84}, {3,518}, {4,354}, {5,3742}, {7,12671}, {10,9940}, {20,3873}, {40,3555}, {48,9119}, {52,9037}, {57,11500}, {65,944}, {72,3576}, {104,943}, {140,3740}, {210,631}, {355,3812}, {375,11695}, {376,7957}, {388,5768}, {389,8679}, {392,5693}, {442,12757}, {495,12616}, {496,12608}, {515,942}, {516,3881}, {517,550}, {601,3744}, {602,4641}, {774,4322}, {912,960}, {938,12667}, {946,971}, {950,2829}, {952,5836}, {962,3889}, {999,6261}, {1001,7330}, {1056,9850}, {1125,2801}, {1155,11491}, {1158,3295}, {1279,3073}, {1319,1858}, {1376,5534}, {1458,7138}, {1478,11045}, {1479,11046}, {1490,3333}, {1656,3848}, {1768,3746}, {1836,11048}, {1837,11047}, {1864,3086}, {1898,11376}, {2096,4294}, {2771,5609}, {2800,9957}, {2810,9729}, {3057,4305}, {3149,3338}, {3158,10270}, {3243,6769}, {3359,3913}, {3428,10884}, {3475,6847}, {3487,8581}, {3522,4430}, {3523,3681}, {3579,10178}, {3616,12528}, {3753,5881}, {3868,5731}, {3870,10310}, {3892,4301}, {3916,10902}, {3928,10268}, {4292,5173}, {4640,10267}, {4719,5396}, {5044,10165}, {5049,9856}, {5123,10942}, {5252,10805}, {5290,10894}, {5302,6883}, {5439,5587}, {5570,10572}, {5603,12688}, {5691,11034}, {5722,6256}, {5887,10246}, {5904,7987}, {5918,6361}, {5927,8227}, {6245,7680}, {6260,7681}, {6684,11227}, {6907,10916}, {7580,12704}, {7966,7991}, {8550,9004}, {9047,10625}, {9799,11020}, {9844,10893}, {9845,11529}, {9947,10175}, {9948,11035}, {9956,10265}, {9960,11036}, {10531,12679}, {10569,10864}, {10785,11375}, {10806,12701}, {11038,12669}, {11042,12681}, {11043,12683}, {12564,12577}</p>
<p>
X(12675) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4,12680}, {40,3555}, {65,944}, {3874,4297}, {5882,5884}<br>
X(12675) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (10,9940), (355,3812), (942,12005), (946,5045), (960,1385), (5777,1125), (7680,11018), (7686,942)<br>
X(12675) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1,84,11496), (1,10085,1012), (1,10391,12710), (354,12680,4), (355,10202,3812), (3243,9841,6769), (3555,10167,40), (3889,11220,962), (6260,11019,7681), (9845,11529,12650)<br>
X(12675) = X(68)-of-incircle-circles-triangle<br>
X(12675) = excentral-to-incircle-circles similarity image of X(1490)<br>
X(12675) = incircle-circles-isotomic conjugate of X(12722)<br>
</p>
